.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit GenericCollection`1<class T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public MustInherit Class GenericCollection(Of T) Implements ICollection, IEnumerable(Of T)
generic <typename T> where T : classpublic ref class GenericCollection abstract : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::ICollection

Docs.typeparam: The type of items contained in the collection
Docs.summary: The GenericCollection class for all public generic collections.

remarks.para: This class implements the .NET Framework's generic interface required for data binding and iterating collections. The class also implements the .NET Framework's interface and provides a property.

Docs.summary: Copies the internal collection to the specified array starting at the specified index.
Docs.exception: The array is not large enough to hold copied data.
Occurs if array is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic)
Occurs if the index is less than zero.

Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer

Docs.summary: Gets the number of items in the collection.
Docs.value: The number of items in the collection

remarks.para: If the collection uses data paging, this property returns the count of the current set of paged data.
